title: Design template management system with dynamic fields
summary: Create a system for managing templates with dynamic fields to enhance personalization and user experience.

title: Implement multi-channel delivery with customizable delays
summary: Develop a system for delivering notifications across multiple channels with customizable delays to improve user engagement.

title: Develop notification preview and testing across all channels
summary: Create a system for previewing and testing notifications across all channels to ensure consistency and quality.

title: Implement automatic channel selection based on user preferences
summary: Develop a system for automatically selecting notification channels based on user preferences to improve user experience.

title: Integrate with user profile and behavior data for personalization
summary: Integrate user profile and behavior data to enhance personalization and improve user experience.

title: Develop real-time dashboards for notification analytics
summary: Create customizable dashboards to track key metrics and KPIs for notification campaigns, enabling data-driven decisions.

title: Implement alert system for abnormal drop-off or deliverability issues
summary: Design an alert system to notify administrators of unusual patterns in notification delivery, ensuring prompt issue resolution.

title: Ensure compliance with CAN-SPAM, CASL, GDPR, and other regulations
summary: Implement measures to ensure compliance with major regulations affecting notification campaigns, such as CAN-SPAM, CASL, and GDPR.

title: Implement opt-out and unsubscribe mechanisms
summary: Develop mechanisms for recipients to opt-out or unsubscribe from future notifications, ensuring compliance with regulations.

title: Prevent duplicate notifications within a set period
summary: Implement logic to prevent sending duplicate notifications to the same recipient within a specified time frame, reducing recipient fatigue.
